headline: Assessing Waste Management (WM) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Why Waste Management is on investors’ radar Waste Management (WM) has attracted fresh attention after recent share performance, with the stock near US$229.23 and positive returns over the past month and past 3 months prompting investors to reassess its current valuation. See our latest analysis for Waste Management. Recent trading has added to that interest, with a 7 day share price return of 3.62% and a 90 day share price return of 6.79%.
